attributes.action: Lift the smoking ban in pubs and other public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The smoking ban should be lifted because people are not going to enough pubs and if it can continues pubs will be forced to shut down due to no one going. If it was lifted profits would increase for pubs. And with alcohol really expensive it would encourage people to go back out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
